api_list.name: POST - Payment Calculator
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mypeak-calculator-api.p.rapidapi.com/financial/payment-calculator"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mypeak-calculator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
